thread.title: What time is 'Fargo' Season 2 premiere on TV?
thread.title_full: What time is 'Fargo' Season 2 premiere on TV? | OregonLive.com

author: Kristi Turnquist | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: What time is 'Fargo' Season 2 premiere on TV?
text:
"Fargo" returns Monday night, and it's far and away the best show of the 2015 Fall TV season. It's not exactly new. But thanks to the "Fargo" anthology format, Season 2 brings us a new story, new setting, new time period and mostly new characters.
Fortunately, the qualities that made the first season of "Fargo" so satisfying are still in evidence in Season 2. The new season takes place in 1979, and, as with the Coen brothers' 1996 movie that inspired the series, the setting is the wintry Midwest.
What: Season 2 premiere of "Fargo"
When: 10 p.m. Monday, Oct. 12
On TV: FX
Sneak peak: 'Fargo': Why it's the best show of the Fall 2015 season
